name: div
category_path: Franklin Pro Classic Adult Batting Gloves: 2096XX
features: MLB Inspired : Time-honored classic worn by both baseball and softball players, including MLB pros
Palm Material : Seamless, premium quality leather palm for a comfortable, responsive fit
Digital Cabretta Leather : Strategically-etched grooves increase surface area, reduce palm bunching, and enhance grip
Quad-Flex Technology : Anticipates palm flexing for a perfect grip around the bat handle
Tri-Curve Technology : Engineered to follow the pre-curved anatomy of the hand to reduce bunching and improve overall fit and feel
Pro Spandex Technology : Provides ultra-comfortable feel and superior hand flexibility
Weather Performance : Designed to maintain grip in all weather conditions
